name: IEQualize
overview:
IEQualize in a nutshell

Our name is our commitment:

The remote maintenance and smart-meter solutions developed by IEQualize mean extra freedom in metering, operating, controlling and optimizing.

The embedded-server systems developed by IEQualize are designed to meet the needs of all trades and can be used to control your heating system, monitor the electricity yields of a solar collector system or combined heat and power plant, or just your private power consumption.

Best available technology tailored to the requirements of energy efficiency and modern communication. Directly from the telemaintenance pioneers.

Control and communication:

IEQualize experts develop embedded-server systems for networked communication in both industrial companies and private households ? down to the smallest entities found in private homes. No matter what application, our know-how relies on state-of-the-art communication technologies and uses the web infrastructure for accurately recording, monitoring or transmitting data.

The telemaintenance pioneers:

IEQualize are pioneers in the domain of telemaintenance. For 20 years, IEQualize have developed their own innovative product series of Internet servers and their peripherals. This allows us to connect virtually every engineering facility to the Internet.

Our solutions can capture and log any type of data (including meter readings, temperatures and status messages) centrally (via web portal) or locally. All you need for this is a mobile phone, PDA or any in-house display, or MID “Mobile Internet Device”. This is because we have found a clever way of integrating radio technology into sensor and web technologies.

Your ideal technology partner:

The team of IEQualize is your ideal partner for implementing up-to-date know-how into your customer products. Our service portfolio ranges from hardware and software engineering for embedded-server systems to Internet portal applications and complete with the required data bases.
